XXvinsutru:1423: tatsthāne trikaraṇīyaparisarpaṇātinā mana rajobhiś ca yāvatas tadagatasya saṃbhāvanaṃ /
XXvinsutru:1426: na sīmāntaraṃ pṛthaktvaṃ krośāntān madhyataḥ parasya /
XXvinsutru:1443: pūrṇavadasatyāṃ pūrakapratyāsāṃ māṃ nyūnaṃ māṃ samasāmantakāt*
XXvinsutru:1457: na nyāyyam utpāṭayed atraiva parikarma kṛtvāropayiṣya ity anusampādya cittaṃ /
XXvinsutru:1497: anissaraṇam atrāgantukatvaṃ sadasatvarūpanirjñānārtham asya tena praśnaḥ /
XXvinsutru:1510: pratigṛhṇīyād bhikṣuṇī mahārhaṃ vāsaḥ parivarhaṇāya kuryād bhikṣuṇyā sārddhaṃ parivarttaṃ
XXvinsutru:1523: anāpattis tāvat kālikacittena vismṛtya mūlyādāne // pratigrahanaissargikapṛcchā /
XXvinsutru:1540: paraṃ gṛhiṇo dvādaśahastakaḥ paḍakottaram antaraṃ saptadvikaṣāṭakaḥ /
XXvinsutru:1545: pūrvakasya ca pūrvalabdhau uttaralabdhāv adhikasya deyatvaṃ /
XXvinsutru:1560: preṣitam akalpikaṃ cīvaramūlyaṃ pratikṣipya paripraṣṇapūrvakam upadiṣṭaṃ vaiyāpṛtyakaram ādiṣṭaṃ
XXvinsutru:1567: vṛttāyām evaṃ pratiniḥśriṣṭau prayacchata uktapratiniḥsargād abhyupetadātṛcittagrahaṇānuṣṭhānāt pratigṛhṇīyāt* /
XXvinsutru:1606: alabdhasamvṛtteḥ saty anyatra svakām atyakte vāna<>krānte /
XXvinsutru:1622: prayogasyārddhaṃ duṣkṛtam ṛddher anyena nabhasā haraṇe nirmite ca /
XXvinsutru:1625: ṣaṭ caturaṅgulo hasto rdhacaturtha<<ḥ>> hastakaḥ puruṣaś ca
XXvinsutru:1678: bandhakaṃ dviguṇam ādāya sākṣisamvatsaraṃ āsadivasasaṃghasthavirovārika gṛhītṛdhanalā[16b4]bhānāropya patre /
XXvinsutru:1682: anyena dadyāt sāṃghikaṃ saṃghabhaktopakrīṇate dhānyaṃ mūlyena
XXvinsutru:1691: akaraṇaṃ parārthe py utsṛjya ratnatrayaṃ paṇāpaṇaḥ /
XXvinsutru:1704: nādhilobhaṃ kurvīt pariskāre tyadhyāvasānaṃ na patrād
XXvinsutru:1727: Vin_2.849 saṃghe sāmagrivelāyāṃ śvo 'ham āyusmanta unna<> pātraṃ cārayiṣyāmi yusmābhiḥ svakasvakāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā saṃghamadhye vataritavyam iti /
XXvinsutru:1730: > svacchaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ paribhogakṣamaṃ sa ced ākāṃkṣasi gṛhāṇeti yathā guṇaṃ rucyā grahaṇaṃ ayācanaṃ gṛhitasyāntaritena /
XXvinsutru:1744: bhūyas tāyāṃ vā durniyogataḥ sauṣṭhave vā /
XXvinsutru:1756: samastayor vyastayor vā kāyavācor āchedārthaṃ pravṛttis tasya
XXvinsutru:1794: Vin_2.901 // pudgale nyatra saṃghe vā saṃkalpitasyānyena cīvarasya [18a1]
XXvinsutru:1803: kalpate yā cchayā pratinidhyantare sugatasya dānam /
XXvinsutru:1808: ekasya dvayoḥ trayāṇāṃ vā saṃghādā bhavato lābhasyādāne /
XXvinsutru:1815: anudbhū[18a3]tāv atra kāle dānapater aparāṇi sāmantakavihāreṇa sārddham /
XXvinsutru:1825: nirdoṣam asampattau caityāntare tallābhasya pariṇamanam utsṛjya bodhidharmacakramahāprātihāryadevāvataraṇānām ebhyo 'nyatra /
XXvinsutru:1828: vyatītaṃ divasam adhiṣṭhitasya sāptāhikasya bhikṣuṃ śrāyet /
XXvinsutru:1832: [18a5] atyaye 'hne kalpikasyābhyavahāryasya bhuktivad ity atra vyavasthā /
XXvinsutru:1833: yasyātrārthe kalpanaṃ taṃ pratyanāpattiḥ kalpitenāsyābhaṅgayoḥ sannihitam /
XXvinsutru:1838: saṃjñāya saṃghasannidhāv adharmasya dharmato dharmasya cādharmataḥ paridīpanaṃ sthūlātyayaḥ
XXvinsutru:1876: samam anupasampannena hīnaṃ vā netrībhūtasyoccāraṇe dharmsyākṣarasyāpi /
XXvinsutru:1883: śṛṇvantvāyuṣmanto kuleṣu kuladūṣakā āśrameṣv āśramadūṣakās tadyathā sampanne śālikṣetre 'śanirvicakrā nipated yāvad eva tasyaiva śāler utsādāya vināśāyānayena vyasanāya saṃpanne vā ikṣukṣetre mañjiṣṭhi[19a1]kā nāma rogajātir niyate[d] yāvad eva tasyaivekṣor utsādāya vināśāyānayena vyasanāya mā yūyam āyuṣmanto 'nena bhikṣunānayā bhikṣuṇyā śāsanaṃ pramiṇuta eṣa bhikṣur eṣā ca bhikṣuṇī dagdhena dhānā
XXvinsutru:1884: aprarohaṇadharmā asmin dharmavinaye bhagavantaṃ paśyata sthavirasthavirāṃś ca bhikṣūn śniti kuleṣu kulapratisaṃvedako brūyāt /
XXvinsutru:1900: [19a3] sthairyeṇa ced artho jñaptipūrvakam arthaṃ kuryuḥ /
XXvinsutru:1902: pudgalabhikṣusaṃghābhaktalābhasya mithyāpariṇāmakatvena bhikṣor anyatrāpy anāmnā coktau /
XXvinsutru:1911: prāka tataḥ saptāṣṭeṣu divaseṣv atas tasya maṇḍalakagandhapuṣpadīpadhūpabalidānatridaṇḍakaṃ bhāṣaṇadakṣiṇadeśanāṃ kṛtvā yā devatā 'smin vṛkṣe 'dhyuṣitā sā 'nyad bhavanaṃ samanveṣatvanena vṛkṣeṇa stūpasya saṃghasyeti-karaṇīyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty uktā jānīhi vādena /
XXvinsutru:1912: vikāraś ced agnimokṣarudhirasyandanaśākhākampanapatraśaṭanādir udṛśyeta pakṣe 'tra [19a5] dānamātsaryayoḥ saṃvarṇanivivarṇanaṃ kuryāt /
XXvinsutru:1932: sādhu syād yady ayaṃ chidyetety uktor niyuktiḥ /
XXvinsutru:1940: chedane ca kuśāder āpadyavabadhena tenāsambhave mokṣaḥ /
XXvinsutru:1943: saṃsparśo 'gninā kṣatiḥ śastranakhaśūkhairmlānyutpāṭana utdalanabhiducchittir iti kalpāḥ
XXvinsutru:1946: [19b4] samyamktvasaṃkhyām agninā kalpane phalānāṃ kalpane samudāyarūpasya tantrīkaraṇam
XXvinsutru:1950: nānabhikṣitaṃ śītena vāriṇā sāptāhikaṃ yāvaj jīvakam abhyavaharet /
XXvinsutru:1957: avadhyāne vā svagatenārthena saśrutaṃ kṣepe vā paravyapadeśena /
XXvinsutru:1961: na svayam enaṃ dveṣyaḥ karmaṇi yujjīta /
XXvinsutru:1971: tasmād vadhyadarśanaparipraśne viyapa tāvat pānīyaṃtāvat piba viśrāmya tāvan na paśyāmi [20a2] na khaṃ vā paramārthataḥ sattvaṃ napaśyāmi vadhyaś cet yuktāv anāpattiḥ /
XXvinsutru:1972: na yatra sākṣitvena karaṇam āpatet tatrāvasthānaṃ bhajeta /
XXvinsutru:1979: tad atikra[20a3]māya vismṛtyāpi prasthānam antaś ca svapnasamāpatyādinā viparokṣībhāvaḥ /
XXvinsutru:1985: dvayor ekatra niṣāde paścād utthāyinaḥ karaṇīyavattā /
XXvinsutru:1989: eṣa vihāraḥ paśya cedaṃ śayanāsaṃ gṛhāṇa cāpāvaraṇīdānam ity avalokanāni /
XXvinsutru:1990: saṃbhedās trayo vātena parivarttanaṃ vṛṣṭyā puṭāntaraprāpti[ḥ] dīpikābhiś ca /
XXvinsutru:1991: śayanāsanatvaṃ sāṃghikatā tasya svayaṃniyuktakṛtatopanikṣepasyābhyavakāśa iti kartṛṇi /
XXvinsutru:1998: piṇḍāya cet praviṣajyāpraviṣṭe vātavarṣam āgacched vihārasthāḥ praveśayeyuḥ /
XXvinsutru:2001: vismṛtya ced bahusamatikrāntādhvano gato vā smṛtiṃ labheta na bhūya evaṃ kariṣyāmīti cittam utpā[20b1]dayed vācaṃ ca bhāṣeta /
XXvinsutru:2003: kartṛtvaṃ prāptatāyām atra yena pratijñātaṃ prakramiṣannāvasād asaṃkaṭaprāpto 'bhisaṃkṣipet śayanāsanam /
XXvinsutru:2010: antaramārge ced bhikṣuṃ paśyet taṃ pradeśam asmai brūyāt /
XXvinsutru:2011: dvāre ced antargṛhopanimantraṇāyāṃ badha āgacchet kuḍyasya mūle vṛkṣasya vā nidhāyādhvani praviśet /
XXvinsutru:2016: sthāpayeyuḥ gacchan vayam āneṣyāma iti bruvatsu /
XXvinsutru:2023: ekānte 'sau tiṣṭhet svakarma kurva[20b4]nn avadhānadānañ ca /
XXvinsutru:2036: kuśalapakṣāpagacchaty ācāryopādhyāye na ca ced anyathā vṛddhiḥ kuśalapakṣasya pṛṣṭhato gacchet
XXvinsutru:2041: Vin_2.1110 [21a1] // svayam aśakto gurutayā vṛttānāṃ navakaiḥ saha
XXvinsutru:2044: dadyur vihārāntare yācyamānaṃ śayanāsanaṃ vastrañ ca /
XXvinsutru:2046: vātavarṣa n ced antarmārge syād vṛkṣasya mūle kuḍyasya vā sthalaṃ kuryuḥ /
XXvinsutru:2055: Vin_2.1121 // kṛtaṃ saṃstaram antargṛhe ..c chorayeyur avalokya gṛhapatiṃ*
XXvinsutru:2057: kṛtatvam asya śironte pādānte vā kṛtatve /
XXvinsutru:2063: anyadā kālena kālaṃ pratyevekṣaṇaṃ parivartanañ ca /
XXvinsutru:2069: prāg gataṃ prāk prakramiṣyanty asmāt tulyatvaṃ sāhyopabhoge /
XXvinsutru:2101: na cet sarvatvena śailaḥ pakvaśailo dārumayo vā /
XXvinsutru:2115: Vin_2.1175 // aparājitaṃ sūtraṃvinayamātṛkādharam a[21b4]nunaviṃ*śativarṣaṃ nāgaralapitam upanāmitakāyatve bhikṣuṇyā
XXvinsutru:2122: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaḥ pariśuddhasamaveto navadyo mā [21b5]vaḥ kaścid asaṃmata<<ḥ>> saṃghena pudgalo vavadate saṃghād va āgacchati pudgalo vavādako na vaḥ kaścid utsahate bhikṣur avavadituṃ
XXvinsutru:2126: ekenāpi vinā tassa<>mmatasya ca bhikṣuṇya[va]vādena pūrvaṃ
XXvinsutru:2135: na ced apāvṛtadvāras tadā tatbhūtasyāgrato vihārasya varṣakaḥ
XXvinsutru:2150: na cet* mūṣitāyai saubhāṣiṇikasyopasaṃpadyamānāyai pari[22a3]vartakena vā //
XXvinsutru:2166: muktvo sabhayatāyāṃ mārgasyaikasārthapālam abhinnaprayāṇatāyām ekabhikṣuṇyāpi mārgātivāhane/
XXvinsutru:2225: gṛhapate yaṃ bhikṣuḥ piṇḍakena vihanyate numodambā<>smai dadāmīty abhirocya //
XXvinsutru:2242: [23a2] prasthānām utsṛjya vyañjanam ūrdhaṃ sahāpi sahāyapratyaṃśena
XXvinsutru:2260: asaṃsṛṣ[ṭa]m akalpikenābhyavahāryam abhisaṃbhavanīyapradeśasthasya pratigrāhayato nivāṇaṃ kṛtvā /
XXvinsutru:2266: sthānasya kalā[c]ikayā ūrdham asaṃpādakatve yavāgvāḥ peyatvaṃ
XXvinsutru:2276: gaccha tavaiva bhavatv iti vacanaṃ karaṇam* /
XXvinsutru:2291: Vin_2.1312 // pratiniyatabhaktāvāsekebhyo nyair antaḥsīmasthair bhikṣubhiḥ saṃghabhūtair asahabhaktatāyāṃ
XXvinsutru:2304: ya[23b3]vanopanvāhārād abhuktatāyāṃ ma? sarvair utkṛṣṭya bhuñjīt* /
XXvinsutru:2312: pūrvabhakte pratigrāhitaṃ paścāt bhakte tatra yāmātikrāntam iti sannihitaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2332: na yāvaj jīvikānām utgṛhītāntaḥpakvabhikṣupakveṣu tatpratiśedhe saṃśitatvaṃ kā[24a1]laṃ prati
XXvinsutru:2335: bahirasya gomayena mṛdā vā parighṛṣṭodakena sammārgo nirmādanaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2337: nirmāditatvam āśayato dvitravadhikaṃ dāne visvanato pi pātrasya /
XXvinsutru:2343: niḥsnehatāyai snigdhasya ca ghaṭāder gambhīra udake hrade nidhānaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2357: na tatsaṃyuktadhārā spṛṣṭau na tasya spṛṣṭatā /
XXvinsutru:2369: ardhatvaṃ nirapekṣotsṛṣṭasya sāpe[24b1]kṣatāyāṃ tasmān netad yāceta /
XXvinsutru:2371: nākalpikatvaṃ bhāganayane spṛṣṭau nītasya praveśane tadrūpeṣu pratyayeṣu /
XXvinsutru:2379: kalpikam asampattau vidher nadīsaṃtāraṇārthaṃ netari ca saṃprāpaṇārtham udgṛhītam abhāve nyasya pathyadanaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2389: bhojyatvaṃ phalānām akāle py akṛtakalpānām apy apratigrāhitānāṃ ca /
XXvinsutru:2396: na karake pānīyaṃ pibet saṃbhave hastanirmādanapatrayoḥ /
XXvinsutru:2408: bhuñjīta tyaktam āśayato dātrānyapratigrāhakābhāve svayaṃ pratigṛhya /
XXvinsutru:2409: sammukhāntaḥsīmny atisaṃbhavanīye pradeśe vasthite nottānapāṇinā kāye tatsaṃbaddhe codgrahaṇasamarthato
XXvinsutru:2410: amanuṣyād api dit*śeyāṅgena tatsaṃ*baṃdhena cotsṛṣṭasya pratīṣṭiḥ pratigrahaḥ /
XXvinsutru:2413: gocaraḥ śākhāmarkaṭānāṃ na tatas tān pratyanabhisaṃbhavanīyatvaṃ bhūmeḥ /
XXvinsutru:2424: luṭhitasya śakyatāyāṃ svayam amuktvā sthānaṃ grahītum adhvaṃsaḥ pratigrāhasya /
XXvinsutru:2435: pratīṣṭhyad glāno nupasampannena bhojanam abhāva upasaṃpannasya /
XXvinsutru:2439: kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ matsyaṃ māṃsam* vallūrā [25a5] iti praṇītabhojanaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2443: tasmāl labhamānasyāpi ced anyallūhaṃ praṇītam vā samaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vā vijñaptiḥ /
XXvinsutru:2446: tiṣṭhataḥ pratikṣipto vā tat kiṃ* yācasa iti /
XXvinsutru:2463: teṣu upayogas tadyathā nirmādanaṃ bhāvanaṃ* rañjanaṃ* sekaḥ
XXvinsutru:2469: tenāsya hi riktaprāṇakadhātāv udaka ity api prayogāḥ
XXvinsutru:2490: ātyuhāyāṃ kalpikajalasya sam*[26a1]bhāvadāyāñ ca karakakuṇḍikābhyām etat tadvattvaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2493: tadrūpaś cet pratyayaḥ kṣamayitvā kāryakaraṇe stitvam āstitvaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2494: tasmāt tadvattvam atra dāne pratijñāte nyena /
XXvinsutru:2498: na pramīlya gatasya sthāne tadvattvābhāve kāmajaḥ /
XXvinsutru:2514: pañjaraṃ vaṃśavi[26a4]dalikānāṃ śuklavastrasya veṣṭim abhrapaṭalena vā tadākhyam /
XXvinsutru:2519: asthitāvajapadakena daṇḍena śanaiṣkumbhe kuṇḍake vā prakṣipya chidrāṇi kṛtvā mukhaṃ pidhāya niṣkāsanam /
XXvinsutru:2520: [26a5] asaṃmattau paṭṭikayā loṭhikayā murucikayā vā rajupāśena vā natuke veṣṭitena grīvāyāṃ baddhvā /
XXvinsutru:2542: nānena dānapatīnāṃ vihāre deyatvasya noktatā [26b3] navasya bhikṣave niddeyatvena /
XXvinsutru:2558: gambhīrāṇām uśīrakurvakena patravaibhaṅgukair natrakena vā yaṣṭyām upanibaddhena /
XXvinsutru:2615: spṛṣṭir udyūthanaṃ prasthāya darśanārtham upavicārāntātikrame dṛṣṭir iti mūlāni /
XXvinsutru:2630: na bhittau bhūmyāṃ vṛkṣe nyatra vā /
XXvinsutru:2644: Vin_2.1622 // saṃ*cintya muktvā rogapratikṛyārtha tāṃ gṛhī dātṛbhaktachedasya kāraṇe /
XXvinsutru:2680: adhvano tra kukkuṭasyotpātya nilayane ntaram abhūtatvaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2693: akalpini ca bhikṣor karaṇīye tatsaṃpādakena sārdhaṃ* glānasya tadupasthāyinaś ca /
XXvinsutru:2694: śrāmaṇereṇa ca tadvataḥ sannihitatāyāṃ tatrāvāse pāpabhikṣoḥ kṛtakurvattan nivāsaprayatnasya
XXvinsutru:2701: middhopapātenādhvani śrāmaṇeram abhiplutaṃ* purataḥ kṛtvā gacchet* /
XXvinsutru:2702: bubhukṣitaś cet sānukālaṃ dadyād asmai tadāhāram* /
XXvinsutru:2706: Vin_2.1669 // tathāham bhagavato dharmadeśitam ājānāmi yathā <>
XXvinsutru:2707: āntareyikadharmā uktā bhagavato pratiṣevyamāne <>lam antarāyāyetyādi pravṛttavacanatāvasarge jaigupsyamata enaṃ kuryu jñāpanena /
XXvinsutru:2725: jñapte caturthasya te karmaṇa iti pūrvatrottaratranāśanīyasya te ity upakramaṃ jñapti<<ḥ>> kṛtā ni<<ḥ>>sṛjedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ prathamā karmavācanā kṛtā dvitīyeti pratyetadantam asmai bhikṣuṇā śrāvayeyuḥ /
XXvinsutru:2739: ekatve vṛddhāntād ārabhya yāvat saṃbhāvanām uparidānaṃ /
XXvinsutru:2746: śastram etat saṃgrāmāvacaraṃ bhāṇḍañ ca gandharvāvacaraṃ /
XXvinsutru:2753: nāsamuditacinnāya svāmy aham iti bruvate dadyāt* /
XXvinsutru:2756: ūrdham anāgatau yat bhūmau buddhasāṃghikayor labdhiṃ*
XXvinsutru:2759: tadā cet svāmy āgacched anujñānam āyā..ya[29a2]n ichate dadyuḥ /
XXvinsutru:2760: vṛddhiñ cet mṛgayed etad eva na bahu manyase yad asmābhiḥ paripālitam iti brūyuḥ /
XXvinsutru:2779: nirdoṣam amānuṣabhavane puṇyanirjātaṃ ced eṣāṃ ratnamayaṃ bhūmisopādānādi /
XXvinsutru:2791: Vin_2.1742 [29b1]nākalpikatvam upasthāpitaśāstṛsaṃjñānām āgārikaśrāmaṇerābhāve buddhapra<>kṛter dharmyārthavaśatayā spṛṣṭau /
XXvinsutru:2797: cihnaṃ sāṃghikāyām madhye cakraṃ pārśvayor mṛgāv adhastād
XXvinsutru:2828: na cet* stambhasya[29b5]śuṣire kuḍyasya vā nikṣepaḥ /
XXvinsutru:2853: śiṣṭād adhyardhato grīsmasya pūrvataś ca varṣāṇāṃ māsāt* /

XXvinsutru:4459: ratnā dīpitvaṃ saṃbhāvane yāvadbhya etat tāvatsu nāvakarmikasya viniyogaḥ samaṃ sa glānopasthāyakrātvatadgāmitvaṃ pariskāraṣaṭkasya nādhiṣṭheyatvam /
XXvinsutru:4466: hāyate glānasyoktoktena dāne yathoktena dāne yathoktaṃ kāryatvaṃ /
XXvinsutru:4473: sa cced anyad etat tadaṃśatvenārthiriktatve pi na ced evam eva buddhe muktānāṃ /
XXvinsutru:4483: yathārham anyasya sāṃghikasya nikṣepabhājanaṃ bhojanāni kṣetragṛhāpaṇaśayanāsanāyapaskāralohanāpitakulālatakṣā ca varuoḍabhāṇḍadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣayagomahiṣyajaiḍakabhaiṣajyabuddhaśāstrapustakānāṃ
XXvinsutru:4522: na rajakena raktam araktaṃ vā vastraṃ śocayet /
XXvinsutru:4555: na medhyāṃ caṃkrame vā raṅgakarma kuryuḥ /
XXvinsutru:4567: / avaśyāya pariśudhe śakyataratvaṃ hastam ardhena bhagasya /
XXvinsutru:4588: kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /
XXvinsutru:4595: kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ rañjanañ ca /
XXvinsutru:4614: dharmyayā vā kathayādhvani gacched āryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
XXvinsutru:4623: na vinaitayā durlabhākūpapānīye deśe cāgārikāṃ caret /
XXvinsutru:4624: prasphoṭitacīvaro dhvagaḥ [47b5] snātavāṃ prakṣālitapāṇipādo vā gṛhītapānīyaḥ poccito pānakes tricīvaraṃ prāvṛtya śānteryāpatho vihāraṃ praviśet /
XXvinsutru:4629: pidhvīyatāṃ dvāraṃ na deyaṃ mṛgayate nivāryo gṛhṇāna iti pratyā[47b6]yitasya pratīcchyāvyupekṣitavatopahṛtau viśvāsavastutāñ copanītena mamaivāyaṃ sahāya ityādi pratipādanayā dāsyatvam /
XXvinsutru:4646: pariṣaṇḍādānam antasya cīvare dhvasto pratividhānaṃ ārāpadakais tatsaṃgrahaḥ /
XXvinsutru:4647: parivāsyābhyavakāśe vṛkṣādy upari saptāṣṭānyahāni pañcāṣātīty aparaṃ śocayitvā śavacīvaraṃ bhuñjīt* /
XXvinsutru:4648: pravedite smaśaniko ham ity upanimantritaḥ praveśaṃ vihārakulayoḥ paribhogañ cānutsṛṣṭasvīkārasya śmaśaniko bhajet* /
XXvinsutru:4652: ūrṇāṃ saṇaṃ karpāsaṃ natukaṃ patramañjarīñ ca /
XXvinsutru:4691: cakrasya darśanārthaṃ karaṇaṃ gharmavātavarṣopadraveṇāspṛṣṭyai kūpagārasya dvāravanta /
XXvinsutru:4695: nānuddiśya dvayaṃ śāstṛpūjāyāṃ datte bhikṣuṇīnāṃ sāṃghike praveśaḥ /
XXvinsutru:4701: tasyaivātra sannipātagatam anuṣṭheyaṃ saṃghasthavireṇa mūlyasya karaṇam /
XXvinsutru:4710: [48b3] datte kasyacid avibhakte vaṅgān mṛtau tadvargyagāmitvaṃ
XXvinsutru:4712: arhati nirvāṇāśayena pravrajitaḥ śīlavāṃ śatasāhasraṃ vastraṃ śatarasaṃbhojanaṃ pañcasūtaṃ kūṭāgāram /
XXvinsutru:4732: na cel lābhasya pātracīvarād atirekass amā[48b6]dāpya /
XXvinsutru:4741: nāsāṃghāṭyāṃ chinnādhiṣṭhānaniyamaḥ nāsatve tadrūpāṇāṃ pratyayānām icchanna[49a1] /
XXvinsutru:4752: na lomasya viheṭhe syānyathā prāvṛtiṃ bhajet* /
XXvinsutru:4765: adhiṣṭhāya tattvenānujñātā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ dhārayed uparāṃ vikalpānekam api /
XXvinsutru:4784: samyaktvaṃ saṃkhyam anuktau sāhyasya vyayacāyanikṣeptre dānam na sānikṣepte manonunmattakā tajñātitadgṛhādātuṃ pratigṛhṇīt* /
XXvinsutru:4788: grahaṇaṃ punar labdhau staupikasya vṛtter mū[49a6]laphalekṣubhyo nyasya bhaktārthasyoddeśopajīvyasya vā bhājyatvaṃ svīkārāya /
XXvinsutru:4799: nānavachinnaṃ bhojanam anulābhe bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhuktavatve tatrāpraveśaḥ /
XXvinsutru:4802: karaṇaṃ sabhikṣutāyām aśaktau teṣāṃ bhikṣuṇyā dakṣiṇādeśa[49b2]nasya sāmānyañ cārayiṣyatīti cārakam āhārasya pratyupasthitapādau dānāya saṃghasthaviro niyuñjīt /
XXvinsutru:4803: yathāsaṃbhāvanam ity avalokya parṣadaṃ prabhūtyelpatve bhaktasya tadākhyānapūrvakaṃ /
XXvinsutru:4805: na cānudghoṣite saṃprāptam iti vṛddhānta ādau gṛhṇīt /
XXvinsutru:4809: pratidādyata ity ato nyena manasā saṃghaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt /
XXvinsutru:4817: pūrveṇa puṇḍakaccho nāma dāvaḥ purataḥ puṇḍavardhanasya /
XXvinsutru:4826: sapta padāny antato gṛhiṇā paribhukte bahupuṭau api /
XXvinsutru:4841: piṇḍībhavajjane ca janapade kholāṃ pūlāṃ ca /
XXvinsutru:4844: kakṣahastikhaṭuṃkāś ca tadanyacaṇḍamṛgān<<ṇ>>ām apy ebhir ākṣepaḥ /
XXvinsutru:4858: atrāpy atra tadrūpeṣv api pratyayeṣv ani[50a2]pattavyatā
XXvinsutru:4863: vāte niṣadyā nipadyā ca sarvam arśaḥsvetad ity asyopayogaḥ /
XXvinsutru:4873: na nābhijñāstaraṇe kṛtvā savidhānam agādhamambho vagāhet* /
XXvinsutru:4884: tadvac chuktaśulukadadhimaṇḍodaśvinmaṇḍakāni dakabhinnāni paṭṭapariśrutāni svacchāni mukhadarśīni śarakāṇḍavarṇāni /
XXvinsutru:4885: ayuktiḥ prāg evaṃ [pa]ścād upasaṃpannena yarśanasya sa[50a5]mānavyaṃjanena /
XXvinsutru:4892: atattvāt taddravyasya kālikaṃ ced anupasaṃpannena marddhanaṃ pariśrāvaṇañ ca paṭena /
XXvinsutru:4897: tadasadatiriktakālāśritāvarūḍhiprāpte tasyāṃ cāgamyatvād bhaviṣyataḥ prākṛtānām anadhiṣṭheyatāpatteḥ
XXvinsutru:4911: candanaṃ cavikā padmakaṃ guḍūci devadāru haridrārdrakam /
XXvinsutru:4922: tadyathā saindhavaṃ sauvarcalaṃ viṭaṃ sāmudraṃ romakam /
XXvinsutru:4925: yāvad āptaṃ dānaṃ snātvā punarasaṃ sparṣaṃ sakṛt snānam iti kaṣāyadānam /
XXvinsutru:4928: tadākhyaṃ punar uccāraprasrāvau stanyayānayāyināṃ vatsakānāṃ viṣe tāv upakārau /
XXvinsutru:4937: jarakucoccārayavāścedakālopayojyatāyāṃ yācakṛtabhaiṣajyasya tadarthaṃ sphareyuḥ nānyāt paribhuñjīt
XXvinsutru:4941: sānye pi sadbhāvas tadadyācārasya tasmād pūrvakalpena tatsāhye pravṛttiḥ /
XXvinsutru:4942: [50b6] nānāpannasya rūpāntaram apūrvarūpatvaṃ tasmān na visaṃpaccitasya parataḥ svakalpenākalpanam
XXvinsutru:4943: sampadyate prakṣālanena śaktataṇḍuleṣu pravṛttāvasthānasya svamātrasaṃkhyatā guḍasya /
XXvinsutru:4963: svasaṃbhavatāṃ tatra bhārīkṛtya sūtaṃ vā nidhānam /
XXvinsutru:4967: [51a3] anayaneta svayam upayātre vināśahetor abhāve nusaṃpannasya /
XXvinsutru:4996: dvādaśāṅgulā sādhvī na tīkṣṇā puruṣā vā /
XXvinsutru:4997: sthavikāyāṃ nidhānaṃ mrakṣayitvā sarpiṣā tailena vā /
XXvinsutru:5008: apetatāyāṃ paligodhasya sthitatve ca manojñasya purataḥ khādyabhojyasya mokṣaḥ /
XXvinsutru:5031: rakṣyas saṃsargas tasmād ūne vigatavegatāyāñ ca /
XXvinsutru:5033: prāsādikañ ca sādhu tasmāc chuklanatrakena sūtīkaraṇam /
XXvinsutru:5037: na laśunaṃ palāṇḍuṃ gṛñjanakaṃ vā paribhuñjīta /
XXvinsutru:5039: nopayuñjanaḥ parataś ca saptāhaṃ laśune palāṇḍau trirātram ekarātraṃ gṛñjanavihāraṃ paribhuñjīt
XXvinsutru:5070: yāvantastā[va?]ntas sannihitāś caturthe saṃmaṃkalpikaśālām vāṅ bhāvakavacanodāhārataḥ /
XXvinsutru:5083: tadyathā drākṣyadāḍimakharjūrākṣoṣṭau vātāma urumānarāmāpikākurumāyikānikocobabhūḥ piñcitikā[52a4]puṣkarañ ca tadākhyam /
XXvinsutru:5099: yato nāgatiḥ śabdasya vihāre tatra kalpakāram āpanam /
XXvinsutru:5103: nābhyām anupānapaṭṭakāc cānyat kaṃsabhājanaṃ pudgalo dhārayet
XXvinsutru:5105: grahaṇaṃ rakṣāyai pratipādyamānānām apy anyānāṃ samānavyañjanānām /
XXvinsutru:5118: nāpārśvanihitatāṃ prāgāvāt pātra[52b2]sya piṇḍāya pravṛttau bhajet /
XXvinsutru:5137: yathā vṛddhikayā [52b4] niṣādanāya dāpanāya ca mahāsannipāte bhikṣūṇām uddeśaḥ /
XXvinsutru:5151: na yena mantrita tato 'nyasya labdheḥ svīkāre 'sty ayuktatvam
XXvinsutru:5155: nāntaṃ visarjayet [52b6] dṛṣṭiśīlasampannābhyāmāntasyānyatra yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dānam atiriktasya cālopād yātrākāriṇo grahaṇam /
XXvinsutru:5157: māt[ā]pitṛglānaputrahyāpekṣakukṣīmatībhyo vineyākāṃ kṣāpiṇḍapātaṃ spṛṣṭavate gṛhiṇe ca saṃprāptāya saṃvibhāgaś ca tatḥ karaṇam
XXvinsutru:5181: śrāmaṇere ca sārddhaṃ paravadayoge kalpakārakānāṃ piṇḍīkṛtya dānam /
XXvinsutru:5191: nedamito vā dehīti bhojanārtham upaviṣṭapariveṣṭāraṃ bodhayet
XXvinsutru:5221: tasmān mukham akāle pravāritaś codgārārāme nirmādayed anyaḥ /
XXvinsutru:5233: adurgandhībhāvaprāṇakāsaṃbhavāya kālena kālaṃ śocanaṃ śoṣaṇañ ca /
XXvinsutru:5289: nirdoṣaṃ śūte kukṣeḥ prāgantāt poccanamātraṃ kṛtvāsanaṃ nāto nyaḥ /
XXvinsutru:5323: kalpikam aśaktau karmakārikāyānitīritaṃ tayā bhikṣuṇā kṛtam
XXvinsutru:5327: na yasya kriyateḥ [54a5] tasmād asatvaṃ pūrakatvasya
XXvinsutru:5351: tatsīmāntargatasyārhasya pūraṇe kāyataḥ chandato vā saṃniṣāde nanupraviṣṭatvaṃ pratikroṣantā ca yasya tatkarma tato nyasya pratikūlaṃ cet dharmaṃ vācyutasyeryāpathāt* pra[54b2]kṛtisthasya saṃyatasya vā cotsṛjyānabhijñasāntarāt* vyagratvaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5354: aprakṛtisthatvam atra cānyatra vā karaṇīye karaṇīyakṛtau ca /
XXvinsutru:5361: na niyamya kālaṃ paunaḥpunye nyatra vā /
XXvinsutru:5364: yasya pūraṇe narhatva śalākācāraṇe pi tasya /
XXvinsutru:5365: saṃghabhede sya rūḍhir anarhe na cāraṇe śalākāṇāṃ /
XXvinsutru:5388: pātrabhaiṣajyaṃ vāme pāṇo pratisthāpya pratichādya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā /
XXvinsutru:5392: rohanty asānnidhye cīvarasya manasā vikalpa utsarge dhiṣṭhānañ ca nānutsṛṣṭe pūrvatra /
XXvinsutru:5399: ādau [55a2] ca triḥpragṛhītāṃ jalitvaṃ tādarthye divasārocane ca /
XXvinsutru:5400: aupayikam ity ante svārthaṃ vijñaptena vacanaṃ pudgalaś cet /
XXvinsutru:5418: ubhayasthatvam ekasminn e[55a4]katra pāde parasmin paratra /
XXvinsutru:5432: na hāsyabhāvena kasyacit sthūlam arūḍhibuddhyā bhedotkṣepayoḥ
XXvinsutru:5434: nānyeṣāṃ nānāsaṃvāsikebhyo barhāṇāṃ pūraṇe gaṇena jñaptivācanayoḥ /
XXvinsutru:5436: saṃpannatvaṃ [55a6] jñaptiśrutāv asya nāvidhir bhavyarūpe pratinidhinā dūtena pravrājanam
XXvinsutru:5446: na bhikṣubhikṣuṇītvayor anyakarmavastupratijñapite codakena kalpayati sāṃmukhyaṃ praṇidhikaraṇam
XXvinsutru:5453: akurvāṇasyāsyāgārikatīrthikadhvajadhāraṇatīrthyasevānācāracaraṇānyaśikṣaṇañ ca bhikṣuśikṣāyām utkacaprakacasya saṃghe roma pātayato niḥsaraṇaṃ pravarttayataḥ samīcīm upadarśayato viramato nimittād avasāraṇaṃ yācite /
XXvinsutru:5462: pratītāyām[ā]pattāvapratikṛtāyām apratikāryāyāṃ saṃvareṇādṛṣṭim udbhāvayantam anicchantaṃ pratikṛtim anuṣṭhātum anutsṛjantaṃ ca pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭim utkṣipeyuḥ /
XXvinsutru:5463: ihaivainām āpattiṃ pratikurvīthā ayam eva tv āsaṃghaḥ prasrambhayiṣyati ity evaṃ brūyyuḥ /
XXvinsutru:5474: sannihite tatrāsrame pratideśanīyasya garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyanta dharmaṃ pratide[śa]yāmi iti /
XXvinsutru:5502: tasmād arūḍhasyāsya pṛthak tadānīm utthāpyatā prathamaṃ ca /
XXvinsutru:5518: nāsāṃ manye praṇidhātṝṇām avasāraṇasya praṇihitau rūḍhiḥ /
XXvinsutru:5526: vikṛteḥ kriyamāṇapraṇidhinā dhvaste[56a5]na ca niṣkāsya mānena bhajane bhāṇḍasya choraṇam
XXvinsutru:5568: śuddhir ekasya purato deśanena saṃghāvaśeṣato hrīmataḥ /
XXvinsutru:5578: ntāsthitapratichādacittasyāśaktavattāyāṃ kṛtaṃ ne vā kiṃ* vā kīdṛśyaṃ ceti
XXvinsutru:5591: śodhite vastuni sāṣānuṣṭhānam anirjñāne pratichādakālasyāsaṃvya ānany ūnatvasya saṃśrayaṇaṃ
XXvinsutru:5597: aparimāna ity anirjñāne sya saṃśrayasaṃbahulāḥ parimānavatya iti prābhūtye /
XXvinsutru:5601: carato paraprāksampannapraticikīrṣotpattau pṛ[tha]g* dānam ekaṃ caraṇaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5666: / prāg* dvāramokṣyād vihārādau ca paryuṣitavac caritapattau /
XXvinsutru:5680: na yatryānye triḥprabhṛtayaḥ sarvathā tadākhyacaraṇās tatra
XXvinsutru:5688: [57b4] kalahakārakāgamanañ ca śrutvā bhayañ cedataḥ pratini[ḥ]sṛjetāṃ saṃghasannidhau pudgale vā /
XXvinsutru:5692: chedas tadahorātrasya prakṛtisthena sārdham ekachadane parivāsikamānāsyacāriṇoḥ śayyāyāṃ bahi[ḥ]sīmni ca /
XXvinsutru:5694: nāsannidhau tatsīmni śrāvyāṇām asyotthānaṃ nirdoṣaṃ tadaharā[57b5]gatau sīmāntare gamanam*
XXvinsutru:5695: na parivāsikena sārdham ekachadane pārivāsikaḥ śayīt* /
XXvinsutru:5696: na tīrthyupanivāsasthasya tena sārdham atra doṣaḥ //
XXvinsutru:5705: āgamaya tvam āyuṣmaṃ glānas tvam aprayojyama ity āyusmaṃ bhūteti glāno sāv ananuyojyā iti prativadeyuḥ /
XXvinsutru:5714: savacanīyaṃ tv āyuṣman karomi na tvaṃ yo smādāvāsādanavalokya prakramitavyam asti me āyuṣmati praṇihitaṃ vacanāyeti /
XXvinsutru:5719: karaṇam asyatra sthāpakaiḥ sthāpitasya tena [58a2] sārdham upasāraṇaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5721: vakṣyāmy atrāmutra vā vase mutra vā vāstuni yatra ceṣṭam ity āropya cāmattiṃ* darśayitvāparādham utsṛjanena /
XXvinsutru:5722: śīladṛṣṭyā cārājīva vipatyā sarvasyāsya codanādeḥ kriyāyāṃ ruḍhiḥ samūlakaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5729: nāpoṣadhe tasya na kṛtau kṛtatve vā strītve
XXvinsutru:5737: Vin_14.1 // na nānātvāya saṃghasya prabhāviṣṇum akā[58a4]maṃ codayed unmoṭayed vā codayatvaṃ
XXvinsutru:5738: na yatra prativirodhas tena sārdham abhinamane samāsīta /
XXvinsutru:5742: dharme vinaye caitadvatām adharme ced abhiniveśo jñātvā saṃghasāmagrīn na vidyate /
XXvinsutru:5743: tasmān na tad anyānāṃ saṃbhūya kṛtau karmaṇo rūḍhin na
XXvinsutru:5745: [58a5] kaliparāyaṇatva eṣā tadvipakṣasya cāvandyatvam idaṃ dharmabhiḥ /
XXvinsutru:5750: mṛddhadvā vayam iti vadatsu yūtham api śramaṇāḥ śākyaputriyā sma ity ātmānam* [58a6] pratijānīdhve
XXvinsutru:5751: yeṣāṃ cedaṃ vṛttam iyaṃ vārtā kāruṇiko vaḥ śāstā yenaitad anujñātam etad api vo na prāpadyata iti prativadeyur anyatra /
XXvinsutru:5754: nāpi sāritāām eṣāṃ sāmagyasya vinā sāmagrīlābhenotthāpanaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5763: karmaṇaḥ kṛtāvadharmavādibhir antaḥsīmni pṛthak tadbhedo tadacittena /
XXvinsutru:5767: sthalasthair atra sanni ced bhikṣuṇīnām acodyatvaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5778: tat tatā yadīyasyotsaṃghe pratipādanaṃ [58b3] dvayoś ced ubhayatra /
XXvinsutru:5784: arūḍhir asyāsaṃghaparimāṇatve bhidyamānānām asatve cānyeṣām antaḥsīmni saṃghaparisānānām adharmadharmayoḥ tathātvena pratyavagatāv ānantaryaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5790: padārthatathātve vipratipattir varjanaṃ sāpattikā sāmagryadānaṃ karmāṇi /
XXvinsutru:5816: tena sasthavire saprātimokṣe nyatra saṃgha upanikṣepaḥ /
XXvinsutru:5825: anupadhūta idaṃ vadet teṣāṃ ca [59a2] āyuṣmanta alābhānālābhādurlabho na sulabhā ye yūyaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyā
XXvinsutru:5826: kalahajātā viharata bhaṇḍanajātā vikṛhītā vivādam āpannām āyuṣmantaḥ kalaho mā bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho mā vivādaḥ // nāsti dvayor yudhyato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājayaḥ /
XXvinsutru:5827: nāsti dvayor dhāvato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājaya [59a3] iti /
XXvinsutru:5831: kharamarthipratyarthikair gṛhītatve pragāḍham* ca vyāḍhatve teṣāṃ bhedāśaṃkitāyām asya saṃsrayaṇaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5842: tathā ced adharmaśalākādhikyasaṃpattiṃ* [59a5] manyeta na chandānupradānena sāmagrye cārayeta
XXvinsutru:5843: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dharmaśalākānāṃ cāraṇakāle grahaṇaṃ vāmenetarāsāṃ /
XXvinsutru:5845: sthavire yaṃ dharmaśalākā ajihmā avaṃkā akuṭil[ā] su[va]rṇā sugandhā sukhasaṃsparśā gṛhāṇeti dvayor vācor itarāṃ mṛgaya tena prayacchet* /
XXvinsutru:5846: yathā dharmodbhavam* [59a6] manyeta tathā cārayec channam vā vṛtaṃ vā /
XXvinsutru:5847: āyusman, upādhyāyena te dharmaśalākā gṛhītā ācāryeṇa samānopādhyāyena samānācāryeṇāla[pta]kena na saṃlaptakena saṃstutakena
XXvinsutru:5848: sapremakena tvam api dharmaśalākaṃ gṛhāṇa mātretaiḥ sārdhaṃ virukṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vā karṇamūle tantunāyaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5851: na bhedodbhavakṣāntyā nādharmyasya na jānannayo bhaviṣyattāṃ /
XXvinsutru:5859: nirvikriyasavikriyaś ca dviprakāraḥ prādeśikaḥ sakalasaṃghagataś ca /
XXvinsutru:5864: bahūnām arthe trāsaṃghe deśyānām ekena pratikaraṇaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5873: viparyayato dharmavinayatadviparyayāṇāṃ saṃghamadhye saṃcintyeti trikānvitaṃ codakam ādṛyeran
XXvinsutru:5875: saṃjñapanama saṃjñapanamarentaḥ piṭakānāṃ dhārayituran evaṃvidhasya samanuyuñjīrann enaṃ bhāvaḥ pratibodhāya sthānasthāpanena /
XXvinsutru:5878: pratijñānaṃ coditena niṣṭhā dṛṣṭasatyatve prakṛṣṭataratve ca guṇato nyasya catuṣpramāṇīkaraṇaṃ gṛhiṇo pi /
XXvinsutru:5919: Vin_17.14 /] vased vihāre Vin_17.15 [60a3] anujāniyur anyeṣāṃ sāṃghike vastuni saṃghāya pudgalāya vā bhikṣave vāsavastu(na)karaṇaṃ /
XXvinsutru:5930: nirdoṣam atadarthaṃ gatasya velāprāptau vihārāntare bhojanam*
XXvinsutru:5932: atiriktatāyāṃ bhikṣu mātrarthād grahaṇan na vihāram avyuperan*
XXvinsutru:5947: utthāyaivāsau kālyam avalokayed vihāram* caityā[ṅ]ganaṃ ca /
XXvinsutru:5948: [..] uccāraś cet tatkṛtaḥ chorayet* prasrāvaś ced u[ddhū]ṣennakharikābhilikhitaṃ cet samaṃ kuryāt* /
XXvinsutru:5975: varṣāśā[ṭ]yāḥ (//) kaṭhinasya cīvarāṇāṃ (//) bhājakañ co Vin_17.67 padhivārikapreṣakau
XXvinsutru:5977: cāraṇe syaiṣāṃ vyāpāro bhukte ca gopane /
XXvinsutru:5986: tat prathato bhuktvā vaṃsam ādāya kākacaṭakapāra([ta])tādīnāṃ
XXvinsutru:6005: dvayaṃ paligodho bhakṣyamāṇena vā dantakāṣṭhād aśucinā vā
XXvinsutru:6007: paligodha tatra nāgnyam ekacīvaratā cadevandane pañcamaṇḍalakena jaṃghaprapī[ḍa]nikayā ca
XXvinsutru:6008: na kṣut*vantaṃ jīv[e]ty abhivanded utsṛjyāntyāvayasamāgārikāṃ ca /
XXvinsutru:6014: nāsya nirūpāpadaṃ nāma gotram vā gṛhṇīyāt* /
XXvinsutru:6033: prārabdhasya ca vṛhatto lpasya vā karaṇārthaṃ bhañjanam* /
XXvinsutru:6043: paścādbhaktaṃ taddāne kālo hemantaś ce[d] grīṣmaś ceti pūrvabhaktaṃ /
XXvinsutru:6089: grahaṇāya saṃcāraṇe lohakaṇṭakānāṃ catu[61b3]ṣke py eṣu dānam
XXvinsutru:6107: sphuṭa(nā)naṃ kledaś ca kāṣṭhasya tasmād ayomayīnāṃ /
XXvinsutru:6138: aupapādukānāṃ satvānāṃ ghaṭiyaṃtravaccyavamānānām upapadyamānānāṃ ca rāgadveṣamohānāṃ pārāvatabhujaṃgasūkarākāreṇa
XXvinsutru:6153: agniśālāyāṃ mecakādi kurvatām agniṃ* ca jvālayatāṃ kumbhāṇḍaputrāṇāṃ /
XXvinsutru:6154: dānapater dīpaṃ dhārayato devadūti yasya ca /
XXvinsutru:6155: nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitānāṃ kalaśa[hastā]nāṃ nāgakanyakānāṃ codakaṃ dhārayantīnāṃ pānīyamaṇḍape
XXvinsutru:6158: na vihāre nabhyavakāśe sadhūmam agniṃ* kuryād dhārayed dhārakuṭṭime sarvaṃ /
XXvinsutru:6164: avaśiṣṭam aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca sarvasaṃghe [62a6] gaṇḍīm ākoṭṭya dharmyayā vā kathayāryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
XXvinsutru:6165: dharmotsave sekaḥ sukumāryāś ca gomayakārṣāḥ pradānam* /
XXvinsutru:6170: ratnārthaṃ saṃmṛṣṭāmṛṣṭayor gandhakūṭipratimācaityayaṣṭichayānāṃ cāryāṃ gāthāṃ paṭhatā laṃghaṇaṃ
XXvinsutru:6183: tathāpy ayogyatve gomayamṛdāstambhasuśire kuṇyasya vā lepanam* /
XXvinsutru:6185: na dvārakoṣṭhake prāsāde vā śayyāprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā vā dhāraṇaṃ kuryāt* /
XXvinsutru:6188: kuṭimāvināśārtham* [[62b3] maṇḍalam adhaḥpādakachedaṃ kāraye[nu]ṣamuṭake cainaṃ sthāpayen natukena vā veṣṭayet* /
XXvinsutru:6198: nāpareṇe sārdham ekatra maṃce saṃ[s]tare nyatra vā /
XXvinsutru:6201: na trayād ūrdhaṃ pracitiḥ sāhyena maṃcarūḍhatāṃ bhajet* /
XXvinsutru:6214: saṃcāraṇe śayanāsanasya dvau ced ekena maṃcapīṭhasya vā grahaṇam apareṇa vṛśyādeḥ /
XXvinsutru:6215: naita[tsā]ṃghikamadayam ākarṣenniṣkarṣed dhīna tathā kuryād yathāsya [drū]mamalarajobhiyogaḥ saṃpadyet* /
XXvinsutru:6218: ātapanaṃ sye śoṣaṇaṃ prasphoṭanaṃ chidrer gaḍakadānam* /
XXvinsutru:6222: aśakyapratisaṃskaraṇatāyāṃ dīpeṣu viniyogo vartikātvena ratnopayogeṣu pudgaladātṛkeṣv api
XXvinsutru:6223: anupayajyamānasyātra kardamena bhittistambhakavāṭasuṣireṣu ratneṣu lepanam ity anupratipattiḥ
XXvinsutru:6226: na śa[63a2]kyaṃ sāṃghikam apaharantaṃ dṛṣ[ṭra] na nivārayet*
XXvinsutru:6246: na saty arthini kṛtakṛtya āvṛddhi bhojyam* dhāray[e]t* /
XXvinsutru:6249: nārthisadbhāve satyāṃ gatau sāṃghikasya paliguddhatāṃ bhajet*
XXvinsutru:6252: nāpitabhāṇḍañ ca suktyāṃ prakṣipya bhitto sthāpanam* /
XXvinsutru:6310: kṛtatām atra saṃvidhānasya upadhivārikaṃ saṃghasthaviraḥ pṛcchet* /
XXvinsutru:6311: vihāramoṣe na ced baddhatvaṃ samāyuktair upadhivārikasya dāsya /
XXvinsutru:6314: nābaddhvā yāvad bhāvaṃ bandhanaiḥ dvāraṃ prakrāmeta /
XXvinsutru:6319: gṛhiṇaś ced atrāgaccheyur dharmyam ebhyaṣkathām anyac ca śakyadharmaḥ kuryāt* /
XXvinsutru:6333: gṛṣme syāś cedārtham apanayaḥ pūrvasyāpi varṣāḥ svakledāntam*
XXvinsutru:6337: kvacid dantakā[64a2]ṣṭhabhakṣyaṇam* kvacin mukhaśocanaṃ kvacit* pādayor ity evaṃ na tatprasṛtatayā
XXvinsutru:6341: pṛthag pravṛttyāpi pāṭhako bahutaropasthāpanakāriṇām aśakta sānukampet* /
XXvinsutru:6356: na buddhavacanaṃ chandasi pade krame vā tatparāyaṇatayāropya paṭhita u[d]gṛhṇītad vahiḥ [64a4] śāstrāṇi samarthaḥ parasaṃjñapane
XXvinsutru:6368: ārṣā gāthāṃ bhāṣaṇenainām abhimukhaṃ sthitvā saṃbo[64a5]dhyachaṭāśabdenāyanaprāpto 'nugṛhṇī[tā]
XXvinsutru:6371: tadbhāṇḍa samutsṛjya śastrakośaṃ sūcīgṛhakaṃ melaṃdukaṃ ca /
XXvinsutru:6374: gacchet tadrūpeṣu pratyayeṣu prativihāre sāv upadrave vyapadiśya /
XXvinsutru:6400: tathāgatapā[rśva]deśavaivṛttatā cet tasyāṃ diśi karaṇaṃ yatraiṣāṃ tatparivāradāne ca sthānam abhūt* /
XXvinsutru:6424: na kaṇṭakānāṃ ropa[ṇa]ṃ nāgadantakānāṃ māsasaṃyojanāya dānam
XXvinsutru:6429: na ced anena gandhair udvartya vastreṇa vā veṣṭayitvā śāstu saṃjñāmāmukhīkṛtyārtham abhidhyāya smṛtaiḥ /
XXvinsutru:6440: [65a1] // navakeṣv asya prāptiḥ paṃcabhiḥ nikāyaiḥ parivāradānaṃ /
XXvinsutru:6443: nirāvadyaṃ vādanāya kuru kuru bhoṣ puruṣa [śāstu]ḥ pūjām ity udīraṇam* /
XXvinsutru:6444: udghoṣaṇaṃ rathyāvīthica[phva?] sṛṅgāṭakeṣu śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhaviṣyattāyāṃ likhitasya iti buddhapraveśo bhaviṣyatīti
XXvinsutru:6447: dhvajair asyāḥ parivāro vedikayāveṣṭanam* lohastambheś ca /
XXvinsutru:6462: samāptāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ nirvṛteṣu vādyeṣu viprakrānte janakāye
XXvinsutru:6470: Vinayakarmasaṃgrahakārikāḥ dhāraṇaṃ vipravāsaṃ ca sparśam agner nivārite /
XXvinsutru:6471: bhojanaṃ bījāghātaṃ ca deśe ca harite śuciḥ //
XXvinsutru:6472: utsargaṃ vṛkṣārohaś ca śaikṣā u[65a5]ddeśāyos saha /
XXvinsutru:6476: ityādy asyāntabhāg liṅga yāñcā bhāṇḍopabhugdrava kāmopabhoga saṃvāsānād arāśodhakavastukam
XXvinsutru:6480: vidhāraṇaṃ saptakaṃ dve cānye dhāraṇādhiṣṭhānoddhārānuddhāra iti //
XXvinsutru:6481: hiraṇyānyacīvarāsanavarṣakajanasaṃghārthaṃ vacanapalasaṃcataḥ niṣprayojane hitvānuddhṛto cānuśāṭī ca dvādaśaparṣya nalaṣaṭkaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃkṣepasyānvananuvyabhiśokabhaṇḍanam /
XXvinsutru:6483: [65b1] jatvaṅgulitalaromachannau ca karṇakagrahaṇe bhikṣoś ca vidyāpāṭhanamocana saṃtagradhāraṇaṃ
XXvinsutru:6484: gṛhe channe layane mañce udvarttanamaṃcaka unmuroṭikā gandhapiṇyākataḥ /
XXvinsutru:6486: chatropānaha āsandī niṣādārikarttanaṃ coḍā // vikrayagṛhapaticyutvā lasuna rajādaka dhāvana dānaparivarttanataḥ [65b2] /
XXvinsutru:6492: jñapanaṃ sekavākyañ ca satyavākyañ ca tadyathā /
XXvinsutru:6511: sīmnaḥ sāmragra dānaṃ ca poṣadhasya ca saptakaṃ //
XXvinsutru:6518: śākyabhikṣu dharmakīrttinā sattvārthe likhitaṃ śrīmad vikramaśilām āśritya phālguṇam āse //
XXvinsutru:6519: gnur chos kyi grags pas bris pa /
XXvinsutru:6520: dpal ldan 'vyri krama śi lar dpye 'sla
XXvinsutru:6524: śī la a ka ra sa bris pa (= śīlākaraṇe likhitam)
XXvinsutru:6525: vigrahavyāvartanī pustakānte gnur dha rma kir tis bris pa jo ca myiṅi mkhan vuyin /
XXvinsutru:6526: etasya dharmakīrtter vaṇanaṃ debler sro po granthe /
